title: ollama/ollama
summary: Official Ollama repo: get up and running with Llama 2, Mistral, Gemma, and other large language models locally.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python SDK for Ollama; chat, embed, pull, and manage models with a few lines of code.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client for Node and browsers; chat, stream, and embed via npm.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: PyPI package integrating Ollama models as LangChain LLM & embeddings endpoints.

title: ollama-webui
summary: Feature-rich web UI for Ollama (ChatGPT-like interface) built with SvelteKit.

title: ollama-cli
summary: Community CLI that wraps Ollama with conversation history, prompt templates, and markdown output.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: VS Code extension that brings local Ollama models into GitHub Copilot’s sidebar chat.

title: ollama4j
summary: Java/Kotlin client library for Ollama; chat, stream, pull, and embed from JVM apps.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack integration letting you use Ollama models as generators or embedders in RAG pipelines.

title: ollama-discord
summary: Self-host Discord bot that answers users via local Ollama models; slash commands & threads.

title: ollama-n8n-node
summary: Official n8n community node to call Ollama chat & embed workflows without code.

title: ollama-rag
summary: Minimal RAG template using Ollama embeddings + Chroma vector store + Streamlit UI.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Community-maintained Helm chart to deploy Ollama on Kubernetes with GPU autoscaling.

title: ollama-dagger
summary: Dagger module that spins up Ollama as a service in CI pipelines for integration testing.

title: ollama-csharp
summary: Community .NET SDK for Ollama with async streaming, embeddings, and model management.

title: ollama-rust
summary: Rust crate providing typed async bindings to the Ollama REST API.

title: ollama-laravel
summary: Laravel package that adds Ollama as a queueable AI provider with facades and artisan commands.

title: ollama-elixir
summary: Elixir OTP library for Ollama with GenServer-backed chat processes and LiveView hooks.

title: ollama-obsidian
summary: Obsidian plugin that lets you run local LLM prompts inside notes and insert results.

title: ollama-slack
summary: Slack Bolt app that adds /ollama slash command for private local LLM chats in any channel.
